text: I am helping a friend to install Julia on a Windows machine. After a clean Julia 1.5.3 install I try to add a Plots library. I get an `ERROR: KeyError: key "Xorg_libXcursor_jll" not found` error; full stacktrace: <https://pastebin.com/Eq7quYZT> Anyone has an idea what is happening? Google finds nothing.

attachments.title: add Plots   Updating registry at `C:\Users\chu\.julia\registries\General`  R - Pastebin.com
attachments.text: <http://Pastebin.com|Pastebin.com> is the number one paste tool since 2002. Pastebin is a website where you can store text online for a set period of time.
attachments.fallback: Pastebin: add Plots   Updating registry at `C:\Users\chu\.julia\registries\General`  R - Pastebin.com

elements.text: I am helping a friend to install Julia on a Windows machine. After a clean Julia 1.5.3 install I try to add a Plots library. I get an
Anyone has an idea what is happening? Google finds nothing.

text: how are they installing?  instantiating an old manifest?  did they update the registry?

elements.text: how are they installing?  instantiating an old manifest?  did they update the registry?

text: Only this: windows installer > run Julia > ] add Plots

elements.text: Only this: windows installer > run Julia > ] add Plots

text: do a `]update` for good measure before that
(even though the log shows the registry is being updated)

elements.text: (even though the log shows the registry is being updated)

text: it worksd after nth try `Installed Xorg_libXcursor_jll ────────── v1.2.0+4` I know some people had issues with package manager yesterday. Probably the same thing.

elements.text: I know some people had issues with package manager yesterday. Probably the same thing.

text: did they happen to have an out-of-date registry by any chance?  but that package has been around for a while and nothing related to that changed recently

elements.text: did they happen to have an out-of-date registry by any chance?  but that package has been around for a while and nothing related to that changed recently

text: It was a fresh Julia install. I have no clue what version it comes bundled with. Well… computers. I guess Einstein was wrong about insanity.

elements.text: It was a fresh Julia install. I have no clue what version it comes bundled with. Well… computers. I guess Einstein was wrong about insanity.

text: there is no version of the registry bundled with Julia, as far as I know, but PkgServer may occasionally serve old versions of the registry (but usually in the order of days, not several months)

elements.text: there is no version of the registry bundled with Julia, as far as I know, but PkgServer may occasionally serve old versions of the registry (but usually in the order of days, not several months)
